Sentencas: Electrical conductivity relaxation (ECR) is a widely adopted technique for determination of oxygen surface exchange coefficient (k(chem)) and chemical oxygen diffusivity (D-chem) of mixed ionic and electronic conductors (MIECs).
Titulo: Enhanced accuracy of electrochemical kinetic parameters determined by electrical conductivity relaxation

Sentencas: However, it has been argued that the fitting process of determining two kinetic parameters from a single conductivity relaxation curve inevitably leads to high error in the determined values.
Titulo: Enhanced accuracy of electrochemical kinetic parameters determined by electrical conductivity relaxation

Sentencas: In this research, we demonstrate experiment-based analytical approaches to overcome the issue and obtain highly reliable kinetic parameters using ECR for the case of (La0.6Sr0.4)(0.95)Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF), a representative MIEC.
Titulo: Enhanced accuracy of electrochemical kinetic parameters determined by electrical conductivity relaxation

Sentencas: As a baseline, kinetic parameters of a standard LSCF bar sample with the thickness close to the critical thickness are obtained using a conventional ECR method along with error range and sensitivity analysis at oxygen partial pressures of 0.2-3.125 x 10(-3) atm.
Titulo: Enhanced accuracy of electrochemical kinetic parameters determined by electrical conductivity relaxation

Sentencas: D-chem with improved accuracy is obtained by ECR under primarily bulk diffusion-controlled condition, which is achieved by either increasing the thickness or coating porous LSCF on the baseline sample.
Titulo: Enhanced accuracy of electrochemical kinetic parameters determined by electrical conductivity relaxation

Sentencas: With the D-chem determined, the baseline data are further refined to obtain k(chem) as the sole fitting parameter and the error range is reduced more than 70% of the original value under all test conditions.
Titulo: Enhanced accuracy of electrochemical kinetic parameters determined by electrical conductivity relaxation

Sentencas: With the significantly improved accuracy and sensitivity of both k(chem)
Titulo: Enhanced accuracy of electrochemical kinetic parameters determined by electrical conductivity relaxation

Sentencas: and D-chem, this demonstrated method is proven to be a practical approach to advance the application of ECR.
Titulo: Enhanced accuracy of electrochemical kinetic parameters determined by electrical conductivity relaxation
